# Unintentional Linguist (Trait)
## Overview
**Unintentional Linguist**: You can speak with outsiders. You gain a +1 trait bonus on all [[Linguistics (PF Freeport Comp)|Linguistics]] checks, and you begin play knowing one of the following languages (in addition to those granted by your race and Intelligence modifier): Abyssal, Aquan, Celestial, Ignan, Infernal, Protean, or Terran. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
